title: M.O.D.
description: Where would you draw the line between right and wrong? When a wanted hacker from the '80s resurfaces with the means and intent to overthrow what he perceives to be a corrupt government, this question becomes of paramount importance to the future of the country. Scott Carver is asked to make this decision when "M.O.D." asks him to help plan a revolution.
author: J.C. Allen
